
```{python}

import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px


sn = [2, 12, 46, 116, 24]
n = [30, 68, 68, 32, 2]

fa_rates = []
hit_rates = []
for criterion in range(1,5):
    sn_below = sn[:criterion]
    sn_above = sn[criterion:]
    n_below = n[:criterion]
    n_above = n[criterion:]

    fa_rate = sum(n_above) / sum(n_above + n_below)
    hit_rate = sum(sn_above) / sum(sn_above + sn_below)

    fa_rates.append(fa_rate)
    hit_rates.append(hit_rate)

answer = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "false alarm rate": fa_rates,
        "hit rate": hit_rates,
    }
)

px.scatter(answer, x="false alarm rate", y="hit rate")

```
